name: eventsscanner
description: ## To start extraction process from scratch run following command: ```sh eth-scan extractWallets  http://url_of_eth_node_api  "0xaddress_of_token_smart_contract" "0xcode_of_transfer_method"  "0xcode_of_transfer_from_method" ./path_to_snapshots_folder block_number_where_smart_contract_was_deployed threads_count ```
